headline: Boeing Jets Face a 125% Tariff. What It Would Do to Airfares.
summary: Chinese airlines can’t afford to pay more than twice the regular price for Boeing jets, but they also can’t simply buy them from competitor Airbus.

headline: Tesla, Alphabet, Boeing earnings: What to Watch
summary: Several big companies will be reporting earnings results next week. Tesla (TSLA) will be reporting first quarter numbers on Tuesday, April 22, Boeing (BA) will be reporting its first quarter results on Wednesday, April 23, and Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL) will be posting first quarter earnings results on Thursday, April 24. Asking for a Trend host Josh Lipton breaks down the earnings results to watch next week. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.

headline: How China’s Boeing Ban Threatens to Backfire on Its Own Plane Maker
